name: Speaking of...
description:
Part of the series “My body is a battleground”. 

These were sentences said to me across my life to fat-shame me. We live in a society that does not accept different women’s bodies, we are forced to fit in a certain body type to be accepted or if not we are humiliated. 

This was said by my father at my back.

This work is based on the art made by Barbara Kruger.
